lines: Roaring fires! Malt beer! Ripe meat off the bone!
Dwarven ale is the finest drink in all Middle-earth!
We serve the strongest ale! None of that weak Elvish stuff.
Welcome #p, may I help you to some ale or mead?
Come on in. Just stoked the fire. Take a seat and get the cold out.
Welcome. Let me know if you want anything... think I got a clean mug around here somewhere.
Come on in. We got warm food and warm drinks!
The mead I brew is best in all the Blue Mountains!
Can I help you to an ale?
Want a drink, or perhaps a meal?
How about some salted pork?
Welcome! What can I get for you?
I serve the finest beer!
At your service!
Welcome #p, I got a beer waiting for you!
I'll put in a discount for you if you want an ale!
Take a seat #p, always glad to serve someone such as yourself.
Well met #p, I'm at your service!
Welcome #p! Tales of your travels have spread far and wide, let us discuss them over a beer!
Take a seat and buy an ale! I'd be happy to serve someone so well-travelled.
Welcome to my halls #p! May my tavern serve as a resting place for your travels.
Help yourself to anything in my tavern, you deserve a discount for all you have done for my people.
By my beard! #p in my tavern! You can help yourself to anything I serve.!
AulÃ«s's Beard! I'm surpised to see someone so well known in my tavern!
A Dwarf does not just offer to trade his wealth with any stranger who comes along!
If you want an ale, #, you'll need to do some more to prove yourself!
You'll need to earn yourself a bit of a reputation before I'll let you eat here.
We Dwarves don't simply trade with any stranger that passes by!
You wish to trade with me? You'll have to prove your standing amongst my kin first!
Sorry, #! I don't trade with strangers.
I must serve my kin before I can serve a stranger like you.
My drinks are too strong for you, traveler.
My ale would kill you, traveler. You cannot handle my drinks.
You can't handle my strongest ales! No one can! My strongest ales are fit for a beast let alone a man.
